library:
<class type="owds::PR2JointsPerception" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A robot perception module for a PR2 robot. Possible parameters are: name, min_period, right_hand, left_hand, and head.
<class type="owds::FakeRobotPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A robot perception module providing fake body parts from a ROS topic. Possible parameters are: name, head, base head_pose, and base_pose.
<class type="owds::OptitrackPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A human perception module using the Optitrack mocap system. Possible parameters are: name, offset_x, offset_y, offset_z.
<class type="owds::StampedPosePerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A human perception module using a poseStamped ROS message. Possible parameters are: name. The module subscribe to "/peopleTrack". Remap your topic if needed.
<class type="owds::FakeHumanPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
A human perception module providing fake body parts from a ROS topic. Does not take any parameter.
<class type="owds::ArTrackPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
An object perception module using the Ar_track_alvar system. Possible parameters are: min_track_err.
<class type="owds::Pr2GripperPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
An object perception module using the Pr2 pressure sensors. Possible parameters are: side (0 left / 1 right), pressure_threshold, distance_threshold, min_period.
<class type="owds::StaticObjectsPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
An object perception module providing static objects. Does not take any parameter.
<class type="owds::FakeObjectPerceptionModule" base_class_type="owds::PerceptionModuleBase_">
An object perception module providing fake objects from a ROS topic. Does not take any parameter.
